title: Level-Tailored Scaffolding Design for Instructor Support in Collaborative Knowledge Building

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Collaboration scenario-based training in VR environments, emphasizing practical language application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can perform problem-solving collaboration in simulation environments using instructor scaffolding support (high/medium/low levels)
Learners can systematically experience perspective-sharing, question-processing, and perspective-deepening stages in VR-based group discussions
Learners can conduct self and peer assessments based on data collected during collaborative processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
